caption.p: Changes in glycerate (a), malate (b), xylose (c), aspartate (d), fructose (e), valine (f), isoleucine (g), and leucine (h) in Ludwigia grandiflora shoots of aquatic and terrestrial morphotypes in aquatic (Am‐a, Tm‐a) or in terrestrial (Am‐t, Tm‐t) conditions. All values were expressed in nmol/mg of dry mass of stems. Same letter indicates non‐different values (α=0.05).
